short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows posting of XML1 into Data Distribution or DFM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows posting of XML1 into Data Distribution/DFM
Allows posting of XML1 into Data Distribution/DFM
Allows XML1 files to be posted into Data Distribution/DFM.

The Postman icon will appear in the right hand side of the URL bar when on a Data Distribution page. Clicking the icon will open the Postman window.

This is an unlisted extension, only people with the link will be able to access this.

This also supports DFM-MessageStore

Now supports HTTPS
